body: Lol, they kept the old translation. Always funny seeing hentai translated for commercial release in the west, pretending blatantly underage characters are 18.  "Can't send you off to college without blah blah blah"... sure.  That boy half your height with the big innocent moe eyes is a high-school senior. Riiiiiiight.
This was my first hentai as a kid. How happy i am i ever found it.
Like @tilt said it. Damn I have a BIG sentiment to this series.

@Balenziaga 
That's because it is. Secret Plot is a VERY old release. This tank is just a re-release of the old stuff, with an undated cover using her/his hewer art style. It would have been AMAZING to remake the entire story in the new style.
The art style feels a bit dated.
